subject: DETAILED VALIDATION REPORT - 3 Endpoints Failing
body:
Team,

Complete validation with counts AND attribute comparison:

## SUMMARY
| Endpoint | Express | AF TEST | Count | Attrs |
|----------|---------|---------|-------|-------|
| Categories | 10 | 10 | EXACT | EXACT |
| Roles | 5 | 5 | EXACT | EXACT |
| Organizers | 49 | 47 | -2 BUG | EXACT |
| Venues | 64 | 66 | +2 BUG | EXACT |
| Events | 384 | 394 | +10 BUG | 18 MISSING |

## ORGANIZERS (-2 records)
Attributes: IDENTICAL
Problem: AF returning 47, Express returning 49
Action for Fulton: Check filter logic (isActive? isEnabled? isVisible?)

## VENUES (+2 records)
Attributes: IDENTICAL
Problem: AF returning 66, Express returning 64
Action for Fulton: Check isArchived filter - AF may be including archived venues

## EVENTS (+10 records, 18 MISSING ATTRIBUTES)
AF TEST MISSING these attributes:
- alternateOrganizers
- display, displayEndTime, displayStartTime
- excludedDates
- hasTimezoneData, isDST, timezoneAbbr, utcOffset
- isAiGenerated, isAllDay, isFeatured
- ownerOrganizer
- seriesImages
- venueAbbr, venueEndDisplay, venueStartDisplay, venueTZ

Action for Fulton: Add missing attributes AND fix date filter
Action for Ben: Confirm which attributes are computed vs stored

REMINDER: Same MongoDB = EXACT match required!

- Sarah
